title: [1.4.6-1.10][ssp/smp][InfStudio]IC2BackpackHUD:工业2装备UI
author: kwwxfl123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kwwxfl123 于 2018-3-30 18:15 编辑 

这个mod其实就是给屏幕上绘制一些HUD，使您可以查看玩家物品栏外装甲项目的耐用性。这些HUD可以放在任何一个角落。大多数HUD设置可以在config里面进行修改。


开发这玩意的时候，只是为了查看IC2 Jetpack的能量储存情况，但已经被改进，现支持所有的头盔、胸甲、裤♂衩，IC2装甲项目增加了额外的duang~。如果IC2的物品检测到有充电，HUD将闪烁充电的标志（比如在你装备了太阳能头盔时，电池背包会闪烁充电的标志）。当耐久度低于13％时，会有红色的叉在图标上闪烁来提醒你。当耐久度耗尽，图标将不再闪烁。




HUD最新版本的外观。






MIlICul.gif (298.5 KB, 下载次数: 440)

下载附件

2015-4-12 15:24 上传





可用的配置选项包括：
在HUD可以定位在6个不同的地点。
彩色背景可以被禁用。
您可以选择从显示在HUD限制非电装甲类型。
低功耗和充电效果可以被禁用。
个人装甲插槽可以被禁用。


Version History
版本历史
[UPDATE 6/02/17] - v3.3
- Automatically move out of the way of the offhand slot if it's there
- Add support for items that use Forge Energy
[UPDATE 9/17/16] - v3.2
- Unofficially ported to MC 1.10.x.
[UPDATE 4/8/16] - v3.1
- Unofficially ported to MC 1.8.9.
- Configuration can now be done in game via Forge's in game Config GUI
[UPDATE 8/29/14] - v3.0
- Ported to MC 1.7.10.[UPDATE 5/04/14] - v3.0
- Ported to MC 1.7.2.

没人看的更新日志
[UPDATE 7/03] - v2.83
- Fixed blending issue when armor items used glint effect.
- Ported to MC 1.6+.

[UPDATE 5/26] - v2.82
- Armor icon rendering now supports multi-pass texturing and status effects.

[UPDATE 5/15] - v2.81
- Charging status effects now override low power status on armor pieces (the way it was intended)

[UPDATE 5/10] - v2.8
- Updated to reflect API folder structure changes in IC2 build 1.115.300+
- Using Forge runtime deobfuscation for compatibility with MC 1.5+

[UPDATE 3/26] - v2.7
- Updated for Minecraft 1.5.1

[UPDATE 3/10] - v2.6
- HUD background tweaked to stand out less
- Low power and charging indicators now fade in and out
- Charging indicator now turns health bar and background yellow
- Charge level bar tweaked to work 100%; charging indicator may not initialize with all addons

[UPDATE 2/18] - v2.5
- HUD can now be moved between six different locations, with auto-orientation
- HUD background is configurable to colorize based on armor health (on by default)
- Electric armor charge level now utilizes EU for more precise metering

[UPDATE 2/17] - v2.4
- A lot of code rewritten and improved
- New color-configurable HUD background
- Shows a lightning bolt when item is charging (usually from solar helmet/solar hats)
- Now supports damageable non-electric armor types (leather armor, etc)
- Many new configuration options added to personalize the HUD

[UPDATE 1/3] - v2.3
- Fixed GL bug where alpha transparency on 'X' would flicker black

[UPDATE 12/22] - v2.2
- Updated for Minecraft 1.4.6

[UPDATE 12/9] - v2.1
- Changed name to eliminate confusion
- Added configuration file with option to enable HUD for other electric chest armor items
- Fixed GL bug where contending overlays could affect the appearance of the HUD
